Body:
Description: Hello,

We would like to delete FSAA data for a number of hosts in bulk. How can we safely accomplish this?

Thanks,
Iurii Druchuk

Standard FSAA Drop job should suffice long as they are dropping the whole Server.

We don't really support dropping partial data from outside of the drop jobs.

Should they want to get rid off all FSAC or SEEK data they could run those analysis from the OOTB job for dropping data, but its all or nothing rather than just by server.
Next Steps Updated: need to check if they have NAM installed and get a screen shot of their license window in NAA

What We've Learned Updated: They are not collecting FSAC data
looks like they should be able to as part of STA-FSI license

need to confirm

Since they don't have FSAC data, should be able to drop the desired host according to KB for decommissioned FS hosts
